issue.title: [CF 111] Shadow Orbs - not being counted
issue.body:
ATTACHING A SAVED VARIABLES FILE/SCREENSHOT WILL GET YOUR TICKET ANSWERED MUCH FASTER

Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Adding the Shadow Orb tracker (as per your suggestion on the curse comments)
Name: Shadow Orb
Type: Buff/Debuff
Buff or debuff: buff
Unit to watch: player
Show when: Present

2. Trigger Shadow Orb stack in combat

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

I expected to see the shadow orb stack (1-3) on the icon, instead no matter what the stack is at, I only see the icon static and unchanging. I also see the icon when I do not have any shadow orbs at all. It doesn't update when the buff updates.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
TellMeWhen 3.0.4a

Do you have an error log of what happened?
There was no log, it just won't count my stacks.

Please provide any additional information below.


> Posted by CurseForge user LediCat | Imported from CurseForge issue #111 | Raw

comments.body:
Sounds like you are in config mode to me.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Ah, I'm sorry. I tinkered with it some more and you were right. I am sorry for the false report. It is now showing the stacks as intended. ;
